title: Custom Hit Test
description: List of hitboxes for melee and ranged hits against the entity.

hitboxes.title: Hitboxes
hitboxes.description: Defines a hitbox size and pivot to test against.

items.title: Hitbox
items.description: Defines a hitbox size and pivot to test against.

width.title: Width
width.description: Height of the hitbox in blocks. A negative value will be assumed to be 0.

height.title: Height
height.description: Width and Depth of the hitbox in blocks. A negative value will be assumed to be 0.

pivot.title: Pivot
pivot.description: The offset from the entity's anchor where the hitbox will spawn
